phrases: I had lost my way during my journey.
Only my soul was wandering, while I stood still.
But right now, I am walking to a distant place.
That is right, ever since I met you on this road.
The travellers witnessed the song, the forbidden song,
And I became attached to it as I heard it alone with you.
If the world I saw in my dreams exists somewhere,
Let us go search for it, beyond the winds.
Whether it is a freezing dawn,
A dry midday,
A shivering night,
or the ends of the Earth, let us go and see it.
Um...
He is another accomplice for today's job.
I am Martin Liebert from the Remerio Company.
I-I am Nora Allent.
Let us set off, then.
Business is like raw fish in a kitchen.
It means it will be all for naught if we do not act quickly.
Do you think it will go well?
There will be no tomorrow for us if we fail.
Wolf and Young Pack
This is no joke.
The sun has not even set yet.
Well, that is because...
I will go ahead.
Please catch up with me as soon as possible.
YOU-Um...
It is okay.
He just does not know how dangerous it is for a shepherd to travel at night.
He is shouldering Remerio's future.
So it is natural.
The stars are pretty.
They are okay.
They are prettier where I was born.
I did not think we could be having such a normal conversation under these circumstances.
We will not be able to hold out if we are pressured all day and night.
Well, I guess you are right.
Tomorrow we will be facing the problematic road.
It feels like it would not be strange if something just appeared.
Please do not panic if wolves appear.
I will guide you safely to the city for sure.
May God protect us.
Hey.
Do you think we will be okay with the wolves?
No, we are already surrounded.
What did you say?
If that happened, I would guarantee your safety.
I cannot say the same for anyone else, though.
It will be problematic if everyone is not safe.
I am not really sure about that.
The wind is blowing in from the forest.
If there were wolves in the forest,
they would have bared their fangs and the sheep would have realized it already
That is a smart dog.
That makes me angry.
What do you mean?
That dog knows about me and is hiding it.
Really?
Geez, he should know his place.
I wonder if Nora knows?
If we fail at smuggling, then Nora is the one who is least able to justify her actions.
We could keep quiet about it and escape, but...
Geez, you are so weak against blonde girls.
I told you what punishments we could receive, right?
She will not be able to stand them with that small body of hers.
Then you should protect her with all your might so that it does not happen.
Horo?
It would be great if they do not appear from here on out.
Eh?
Ah, yes, really great.
If we set off at dawn, we will reach Ramtra by noon.
And then it will finally be my turn.
I will go and sleep to prepare myself.
May you sleep well.
Stay back, Lawrence.
There is nothing to panic about.
Please wake up and be careful.
Did you drive them away?
At the very least, they have gone further away.
The wolves here are always like this.
They do not howl or show any signs of attacking.
They just watch and stare at us.
It certainly is strange that they do not howl.
I hope it goes well.
You are right.
Um...
Are you familiar with wolves, Horo?
Ah, no, um...
You seemed to have noticed the wolves quite quickly last night.
It is nothing, just something like instinct.
Is that so?
I might have been on guard to some extent.
You just cannot rely on men.
Do not you think so?
Eh?
Ah, no, that is not...
Okay, then what do you think about him?
You do not need to worry, so just say what you think.
You have a pretty good eye for people!
In the first place, it is strange to ask someone who is travelling with a man if they are familiar with wolves.
Why is that?
By the time night sets, the wolves will have already appeared.
There is a cute rabbit like you right before them, after all.
There is no way a rabbit who is about to be eaten by wolves every night would not be familiar with them.
Ah, um, that is because...
That is a nice reaction!
Well, it is the opposite for me.
My companion is a rabbit who would die from loneliness if I did not care for him.
Either way,
it was just a coincidence that I noticed the wolves quickly.
I had thought you were a shepherd.
That is a real surprise.
Enik seems to be very conscious of you, Horo.
Ah, that is probably because he is fallen for me.
Um, Enik has?
You care for him very much, right?
Because of that, he probably favors you more.
If he does not frolic with others sometimes, his desires will show for sure.
You should be blunt sometimes.
It will become a good rein.
If he is unfaithful to me in the future, I will do what you told me.
That will be good.
But right now,
I want to praise him as much as I can.
Whether this job succeeds or fails,
I will stop being a shepherd.
Do you feel a bit more relieved now?
I give up.
You certainly have it.
Thank goodness, I thought it did not go well.
Did I look that way?
I am sure you feel nervous carrying such a large amount of gold.
I am ashamed.
Well then, let us set off.
Just like this gold, a shining tomorrow awaits us.
I-Is this really the same road we took?
I-It just feels very different to me.
Enik!
I am sorry, let us hurry.
They are here.
Yes, they are also on that hill.
W-Will we be alright?
Yes, but please hurry!
Enik!
The girl is doing well.
The wolves will not be able to make a move like this.
What do you mean?
Wolves will not do anything that will harm a member of their pack.
They act carefully by spreading the pack out and slowly cornering their prey.
Enik!
But with their formation,
we can turn the tables on them.
We can get through at this rate.
A single wolf will not come and attack.
Hey...
What is it?
Sink or swim!
Stand down!
Youngsters are like that lately, even among humans.
The ones in the forest are the same.
Is it all right now?
Nora!
How is it?
I do not know, but I will do my best.
No way...
Hey...
It looks like I will have to deal with things here.
Once the girl and man go first,
you should distance yourself as well.
Why?
I told you it is not a normal wolf.
If I stay here, the pack will not chase the sheep.
Their target is not the sheep.
What thoughtless obstinacy.
What stupid pride.
Every one of these youngsters only value themselves.
Hey, if you do not say anything, no one will move.
Cooperation between partners is important, right?
We will take care of things here.
You two take the gold and continue as planned.
But!
No, let us leave things to them.
Let us meet again at the walls of Rubinheigen!
We will all be rich then!
We wish you luck.
Distance yourself as much as possible.
It will be troublesome if you are close.
You understand, do not you?
I will not forgive you if you lose.
I would kiss you here if you were a good male.
That is right, take care of this.
If possible, I would like to settle this peacefully, but
I do not know what will happen.
I will be naked and cold when we meet again.
You will be troubled, right?
Let us meet again.
We cannot stop!
Nora!
Are you going to let their deaths be in vain?
Their deaths?
Forgive me.
Let us hurry to answer their courage.
Is that all you have to say?
You really are a youngster.
You bare your fangs right away.
Horo!
You are Lawrence?
Ah, yes.
So you are safe.
We heard about it from Liebert.
We were waiting outside the forest for you in case anything were to happen,
but you did not come no matter how long we waited.
Is that so?
It began to rain harder, so I was trying to dry off my clothes.
So, Lawrence, where is your companion?
She is not here.
That is great to hear.
I will not tell you to not think badly of us.
Is the Remerio Company going to betray me?
It is insurance.
I felt heavy-hearted knowing that there was a woman.
So it is fortunate that she is not here.
It may be an excuse, but we are hanging off a cliff too.
We must eliminate all the dangers we can.
Do you think I will do what you tell me to?
Everyone will fall to greed with a large amount of gold before them.
It is common sense in the world of business, is not it?
I will let you keep your companion's robe.
It would fill my heart with grief, so I cannot tell you that we may meet again.
When I think about what will happen after, I start to feel depressed.
Hey!
Is not it the same with you?
But, that is the girl this man brought!
Do not tell me...!
Just look!
If you had stayed still...
How about we tie up the girl and leave her here?
We can have the wolves take care of them.
Idiot!
She uses pagan magic!
She would probably survive even if we tied both her hands and blindfolded her.
If that happens, we will be the ruined ones.
But it is really depressing to have to take care of her.
Do not say it!
Sorry.
How are we going to finish him?
Should we stab him?
No, it is better if we kill less.
I agree.
Let us go, Liebert will yell at us if we do not hurry.
Your companion is probably dead.
Seven apples on the witch's tree
With seven seeds to plant inside of me
In spring time I grew a magic song
Then skipping along,
I sang the song to everyone
I look at the world through apple eyes
And cut myself a slice of sunshine pie
I danced with the peanuts for the flies
Till someone had told me
To say hello for every good-bye
Saw some sugar stars
I will put them in a jar
And we will wish around the world
Oh we will wish around the world
I am a little wolf inside a cart
You say,
And off I go from June to May
Oh we will wish around the world
Let us wish around the world
Next, Wolf and New Journey.
Next, Wolf and New Journey.
